Description: Material fell from overhead rack narrowly missing worker.
ImmediateActions: Machine stopped and electrical panel isolated.
CorrectiveActions: Schedule maintenance and reinforce safety procedures.

Description: Compressed air hose burst causing loud impact noise.
ImmediateActions: Emergency stop activated and supervisor notified.
CorrectiveActions: Introduce lifting training and mechanical aids.

Description: Operator slipped on coolant spill near CNC machine.
ImmediateActions: Machine stopped and electrical panel isolated.
CorrectiveActions: Enhance ventilation and label chemical containers.

Description: Electrical short circuit occurred at press machine.
ImmediateActions: Machine stopped and electrical panel isolated.
CorrectiveActions: Enhance ventilation and label chemical containers.

Description: Hot metal fragment flew during grinding operation.
ImmediateActions: Emergency stop activated and supervisor notified.

Description: Forklift collided with pallet stack while reversing.
ImmediateActions: Spill cleaned and anti-slip signs placed.
